mapper.sql: vod_id, type_id, type_id_1, group_id, vod_name, vod_sub, vod_en, vod_status, vod_letter, vod_color, vod_tag, vod_class, vod_pic, vod_pic_thumb, vod_pic_slide, vod_actor, vod_director, vod_writer, vod_behind, vod_blurb, vod_remarks, vod_pubdate, vod_total, vod_serial, vod_tv, vod_weekday, vod_area, vod_lang, vod_year, vod_version, vod_state, vod_author, vod_jumpurl, vod_tpl, vod_tpl_play, vod_tpl_down, vod_isend, vod_lock, vod_level, vod_points_play, vod_points_down, vod_hits, vod_hits_day, vod_hits_week, vod_hits_month, vod_duration, vod_up, vod_down, vod_score, vod_score_all, vod_score_num, vod_time, vod_time_add, vod_time_hits, vod_time_make, vod_trysee, vod_douban_id, vod_douban_score, vod_reurl, vod_rel_vod, vod_rel_art, vod_play_from, vod_play_server, vod_play_note, vod_down_from, vod_down_server, vod_down_note, vod_pwd, vod_pwd_url, vod_pwd_play, vod_pwd_play_url, vod_pwd_down, vod_pwd_down_url, vod_copyright, vod_points, create_time,last_time,host_team,guest_team,source,hot,tv_serial_number
mapper.select: select * from mac_vod where (type_id = #{typeId} or 0= #{typeId}) and (type_id_1 = #{typeId1} or 0= #{typeId1} ) and (group_id = #{groupId} or 0= #{groupId} ) order by hot asc,RAND(),create_time desc limit #{page},#{limit}
select * from mac_vod where (type_id = #{vod.typeId} or 0= #{vod.typeId}) and (vod_name = #{vod.vodName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) order by hot asc,RAND(),create_time desc limit #{page},#{limit}

select * from mac_vod where (type_id = #{typeId} or 0= #{typeId}) and (type_id_1 = #{typeId1} or 0= #{typeId1} ) and (group_id = #{groupId} or 0= #{groupId} ) order by create_time desc,RAND(), hot asc limit #{page},#{limit}
select * from mac_vod where vod_name like CONCAT('%',#{condition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') order by last_time desc limit #{page},#{limit}
mapper.delete: delete from mac_vod where source = #{source} and ((to_days(now())-to_days(create_time))>#{expire})

#{vodTimeAdd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vod_time_hits = #{vodTimeHits,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vod_time_make = #{vodTimeMake,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vod_trysee = #{vodTrysee,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, vod_douban_id = #{vodDoubanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vod_douban_score = #{vodDoubanScore,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, vod_reurl = #{vodReurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vod_rel_vod = #{vodRelVod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vod_rel_art = #{vodRelArt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vod_play_from = #{vodPlayFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vod_play_server = #{vodPlayServer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vod_play_note = #{vodPlayNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vod_down_from = #{vodDownFrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vod_down_server = #{vodDownServer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vod_down_note = #{vodDownNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vod_pwd = #{vodPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vod_pwd_url = #{vodPwdUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vod_pwd_play = #{vodPwdPlay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vod_pwd_play_url = #{vodPwdPlayUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vod_pwd_down = #{vodPwdDown,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vod_pwd_down_url = #{vodPwdDownUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vod_copyright = #{vodCopyright,jdbcType=BIT}, vod_points = #{vodPoints,jdbcType=SMALLINT} where vod_id = #{vodId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mac_vod
vod_play_url = #{vodPlayUrl,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
type_id = #{typeId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
where vod_name = #{vodName} and vod_director = #{vodDirector}
mapper.select:
select * from mac_vod where vod_sub=0 and vod_serial=1
limit #{page},#{limit}
